author: Christina Zhao
title: Chris Cuomo Says His Wife Cristina, Who Has Coronavirus, Believes 2 of Their Children Had Covid-19 in Past 2 Months
description: Cuomo pointed to symptoms such as "sinus, fever and lethargy" as signs that suggest they could have been infected with the virus, but noted that they "just don't know."
content:
CNN host Chris Cuomo on Thursday evening said that his wife, Cristina Greeven Cuomo, who recently tested positive for the coronavirus, believes two of their children had the disease in the past few months.
Cuomo, who announced his own COVID-19 diagnosis late… [+3107 chars]
